headline: GILD Obtains Positive CHMP Opinion for Liver Disease Drug
summary: The CHMP recommends the approval of Gilead's seladelpar in combination with ursodeoxycholic acid for the treatment of primary biliary cholangitis in adults.

raw.headline: GILD Obtains Positive CHMP Opinion for Liver Disease Drug

headline: Gilead (GILD) Upgraded to Buy: Here's Why
summary: Gilead (GILD) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.
